text:
In Tucson, Bernie Sanders slams Donald Trump for calling immigrants criminals 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
In a Friday night rally attended by at least 11,000 adoring fans in Tucson, Arizona, presidential candidate Bernie Sanders skewered Donald T... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
